Introducing a Fun Summer Math Program for K-5: Splash Math now includes a lot of fun math games for your child's summer learning.
- 8 Week Summer Program. Start anytime and halt summer slide
- Starts with an assessment and then provides a weekly plan for the summer
- Set weekly goals as per your child's summer goals
- Helps your child get ready for the next grade and prevent the summer slide
- Provides regular email reports as well as comprehensive reporting dashboard
- A certificate of completion at the end of the program.

Thanks for choosing Splash Math as your learning partner. In this update, we’ve made the app universal. The app is now available on iPad, iPhone and iPod.

Splash Math just launched the Summer Program 2018 for elementary kids. It is an interactive, fun, and rigorous 8-week program to help kids get ready for next grade. All Splash Math users will get free access to the summer program plus weekly critical-thinking packs for as low as $29

Splash Math just launched the Summer Program 2018 for elementary kids. It is an interactive, fun, and rigorous 8-week program to help kids get ready for the next grade. All Splash Math users will have the option to access to the summer program.

In this update, we have rolled out Christmas Edition.


The new edition comes with the daily learning plan nestled in a beautiful winter-themed background. Speckled with snowfall and a flying sleigh here and a shooting star there, the dashboard adds a good dose of Christmas drama to children’s daily math practice. The Splash Math background score is replaced with fun Christmas carols, and children’s favorite characters come dressed in Christmas-themed outfits. What’s more, there’s a ‘Chistmassy’ present waiting for your child at the end of the learning plan for the day.

In this update, we have rolled out Christmas Edition.


The new edition comes with the daily learning plan nestled in a beautiful winter-themed background. Speckled with snowfall and a flying sleigh here and a shooting star there, the dashboard adds a good dose of Christmas drama to children’s daily math practice. The Splash Math background score is replaced with fun Christmas carols, and children’s favorite characters come dressed in Christmas-themed outfits. What’s more, there’s a ‘Chistmassy’ present waiting for your child at the end of the learning plan for the day

The new edition comes with the daily learning plan nestled in a beautiful winter-themed background. This new year edition comes with the daily learning plan nestled in a beautiful winter-themed background. Speckled with snowfall, flying sleighs and shooting stars, the dashboard adds a good dose of holiday drama to your child's daily math practice. The Splash Math background score is replaced with fun holiday jingles, and children’s favorite characters come dressed in colorful festive outfits. What’s more, there’s an exciting new year present waiting for your child at the end of the learning plan for the day.
